Structs/BarabaConfiguration.html#/s:6Bar.name: automatic
Structs/BarabaConfiguration.html#/s:6Bar.abstract: An automatic configuration. Baraba determines which configuration to use based on hardware availability.

Structs/BarabaConfiguration.html#/s:6Bar.name: ar
Structs/BarabaConfiguration.html#/s:6Bar.abstract: A configuration that uses ARKit Face Tracking to detect faces.

Structs/BarabaConfiguration.html#/s:6Bar.name: av
Structs/BarabaConfiguration.html#/s:6Bar.abstract: A configuration that uses AVFoundation to track faces.

Structs/BarabaConfiguration.html.name: BarabaConfiguration
Structs/BarabaConfiguration.html.abstract: A configuration that defines behavior for a Baraba object.

Protocols/BarabaDelegate.html#/s:6Baraba.name: barabaDidStartScrolling(_:)
Protocols/BarabaDelegate.html#/s:6Baraba.abstract: Tells the delegate that Baraba initiated the auto-scrolling.

Protocols/BarabaDelegate.html#/s:6Baraba.name: barabaDidStopScrolling(_:)
Protocols/BarabaDelegate.html#/s:6Baraba.abstract: Tells the delegate that Baraba stopped the auto-scrolling.

Protocols/BarabaDelegate.html#/s:6Baraba.name: baraba(_:didFailWithError:)
Protocols/BarabaDelegate.html#/s:6Baraba.abstract: Tells the delegate that Baraba has stopped running due to an error.

Protocols/BarabaDelegate.html.name: BarabaDelegate
Protocols/BarabaDelegate.html.abstract: Methods you can implement to be notified of Baraba events and life cycle changes.

Enums/BarabaError.html#/s:6Baraba0A5Erro.name: cameraUnauthorized
Enums/BarabaError.html#/s:6Baraba0A5Erro.abstract: An error code that indicates the app doesn’t have user permission to use the camera.

Enums/BarabaError.html#/s:6Baraba0A5Erro.name: unsupportedConfiguration
Enums/BarabaError.html#/s:6Baraba0A5Erro.abstract: An error code that indicates the configuration you chose to create Baraba object is not supported on the device.

Enums/BarabaError.html#/s:6Baraba0A5Erro.name: cameraFailed(_:)
Enums/BarabaError.html#/s:6Baraba0A5Erro.abstract: An error code that indicates the camera sensor has failed.

Enums/BarabaError.html#/s:6Baraba0A5Erro.name: unknown
Enums/BarabaError.html#/s:6Baraba0A5Erro.abstract: An error code that indicates an unknown error has occured.

Enums/BarabaError.html.name: BarabaError
Enums/BarabaError.html.abstract: The type for errors thrown by Baraba methods.

Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC24isCon.name: isConfigurationSupported(_:)
Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC24isCon.abstract: Returns a boolean value indicating whether a given configuration is supported by the device.

Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC10scrol.name: scrollView
Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC10scrol.abstract: The scroll view that will be auto-scrolled when user is looking at the device.

Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC13pause.name: pauseDuration
Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC13pause.abstract: The duration of pause after user finishes dragging the scroll view. Default value is 2.0 seconds.

Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC20prefe.name: preferredScrollSpeed
Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC20prefe.abstract: The preferred speed for auto-scrolling the scroll view, represented in points per second.

Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC17actua.name: actualScrollSpeed
Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC17actua.abstract: The actual scroll speed, represented in points per second.

Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC8isActi.name: isActive
Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC8isActi.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether this Baraba object is active and tracking user’s face.

Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC11isScr.name: isScrolling
Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC11isScr.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the scroll view is being auto-scrolled. Read-only.

Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC6resume.name: resume()
Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC6resume.abstract: Starts the tracking of user’s face for auto-scrolling.

Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC13confi.name: init(configuration:)
Classes/Baraba.html#/s:6BarabaAAC13confi.abstract: Creates a new Baraba object with the specified configuration.

Classes/Baraba.html.name: Baraba
Classes/Baraba.html.abstract: The main object that you use to add auto-scrolling to a scroll view.
